wiki.summary: "소나기" (Sudden Shower) is the first part of the official television soundtrack for the 2024 South Korean tvN television series Lovely Runner, performed by the drama's lead actor Byeon Woo-seok, acting in the drama and song as Ryu Sun-jae, the vocalist of the fictional group ECLIPSE, released on April 8, 2024, the same day as the first episode airing. It's one of the most successful original soundtracks from a Korean drama in the past decade Read more on Last.fm.
wiki.content: "소나기" (Sudden Shower) is the first part of the official television soundtrack for the 2024 South Korean tvN television series Lovely Runner, performed by the drama's lead actor Byeon Woo-seok, acting in the drama and song as Ryu Sun-jae, the vocalist of the fictional group ECLIPSE, released on April 8, 2024, the same day as the first episode airing. It's one of the most successful original soundtracks from a Korean drama in the past decade, going viral on TikTok along with the television show, and peaking at #1 on the iTunes chart, #3 on the MelOn Daily Chart, #4 on the Circle Digital 200 chart, #4 on the Genie charts, #5 on Bugs charts, #8 on FLO charts, , #6 on Apple Music, #10 on the YouTube chart, #17 on the radio charts, and #26 on the Spotify South Korea chart. The song also debuted on the Billboard Global 200 at #199, and riser to No. 76 on Global Excl. U.S. chart. It is still charting on most charts as of Autumn 2024. Read more on Last.fm.
